<h1>Download SharpKit</h1>
<font color="#666666">First</font>
  * <b><a href="http://sharpkit.googlecode.com/svn/release/SharpKitSetup.msi">Download SharpKit C# to JavaScript Web Toolkit</a></b>
<font color="#666666">And then</font>
  * <b><a href="http://sharpkit.googlecode.com/svn/release/samples.zip">Download sample code solution</a></b>

<font color="Red"><b>Note:</b> sample code solution will not compile if you do not install SharpKit</font>

<h3>System requirement</h3>
  * Windows XP / Vista/ 7 / 2003 Server / 2008 Server (32bit or 64bit)
  * Microsoft .NET framework 3.5

<h3>Installing SharpKit</h3>
Download the installer, double-click the file, and follow the setup wizard instructions.

<wiki:video url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mmCefOMmEMw"/>

Once you have completed both steps, you might want to read the <a href='http://code.google.com/p/sharpkit/wiki/Hello_SharpKit'>getting started guide</a>
